transcript:
Executive: Yes sir?

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Yes ma'am, bataiye.

Customer: Sir, mai Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se, kaise hai aap?

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Kaha se baat kar rahi hai?

Customer: IndiaMART head office.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Yes ma'am, bataiye.

Customer: IndiaMART head office sir.

Executive: Ji bataiye ma'am.

Customer: Ji sir, aapke saath video meeting hokar mera discussion hua tha, aapki inquiries ko leke sir.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Toh direct inquiry ke saath jo possibility thi jitni generate ho sakti thi, woh sir aapko display kar di.

Customer: Mail ID pe bhi direct inquiries aa rahi thi, hindi maine aapko show kara tha. Nahi aapka naam kya bataya ma'am aapne?

Customer: Sir Richa.

Executive: Richa ji. Richa ji maine phone aapka kaat diya tha. Isliye kaat diya tha ki aap ek ladies hone ke bawajud mai aapko gaali bol nahi sakta. Maine aapko paisa teen saal ka diya hai. 2 lakh something payment, barabar hai? Uske hisab se mujhe service nahi milegi na toh mai aapko kahi bhi bol sakta hu. Matlab ki service nahi achi hai toh. Otherwise mai aisa aadmi nahi hu. Mere paas itna time nahi hai ki mai aapko kuch bhi bol saku. 

Customer: Sir aapki service me jitni possibility hai cheeze provide karne ki. Jo bhi aap bol rahe hai na, pehle toh aap sun lijiye. Kyuki sunne ka aadat daal dijiye. Aap service ka jo mujhe bhi pehle bhi bataya gaya tha, maine chaar recording dala hua hai aapko. Attachment bhi, barabar hai? Mail dala hua hai. Toh usme mai sab record kar raha hu. Isliye kar raha hu, mai galat nahi hu. Maine aapko sab woh jo video meeting me aapko maine bhi dikhaya tha ki aapka software ka issue hai IndiaMART ka. Aap jo buyleads me bhi dikh raha hai, usme bhi dikh raha hai. Mai aisa nahi bol raha hu ki aapke inquiry nahi aa raha hai. Lekin jo mere ko concern requirement chahiye, woh nahi aa raha hai. Mera basically maine Vinit ji ko bhi bataya tha, uske pehle Aditya ji the, usko bhi bataya tha. Uske baad me Vivek ji tha, uska head, usko bhi maine clearly bataya tha ki hamara itna itna product chal raha hai. Baki sab product ka hum trading kar rahe hai. Toh uski us product ka sabhi ka mera quantity lagta hai puri gaadi ka. Mai bulk manufacturer hu mai. Bulk ka hum aap samajh rahe hai na? Matlab ki aap wholesale me lene jayenge ya retail me lene jayenge. Retail me aapko ek piece bhi mil sakta hai. Hamare paas me ek piece nahi mil sakta hai. Hum aapko 20 ya 15, 30, 30 de sakte hai. Matlab ki hamara bulk quantity ka kaam hai. Yeh sab saari cheeze maine batayi thi, phir bhi uska solution nahi hua. Kitne aur mai 6 saal se, 6 mahine se, 6 mahine se yeh problem resolve kar raha hu. Iske liye aapne teesri baar maine mail dala hai. Otherwise mere paas itna waqt hi nahi hai ki aapko mai aap puri baat samjha saku mai.

Customer: Thik hai, aapki baat complete hui sir?

Executive: Ji ma'am.

Executive: Aur dusra baat yeh ki premium ka mat batayega. Premium ka baat mat karega kyuki maine already mere bagal me hi hai teen chaar factory wale. Woh har mahine ka installment bhar rahe hai. Halaki usko mehnga pad raha hai. Lekin har mahine ka aapka IndiaMART ka premium leke woh kahi na kahi business leke jaate hai. Hamare paas kyu nahi aata hai? Mai yeh bolna chahta hu. Ya toh hamare me koi kami hai kya hai? Aap kami hai toh hame bataiye ki hum aapko kaise resolve kar sake. Pichli baar jab maine Vivek ji se baat kiya tha, woh bole the ki aapka product ka photos wagera nahi hai. Bola ki product catalog hum daal dete hai. Photos wagera humne hamare yaha se paar ke daal diye. Aur uske baad me bola ki video nahi hai toh maine video bana ke bhi daal diye. Usne bola ki content me bhi kuch kami rahegi hai toh content bhi sahi kar diya hai maine. Phir bhi hamare related inquiry nahi aa rahi toh iska matlab kya samjhe? Aapka platform lene ka matlab kya hai?

Customer: Hmm, aapki baat. Quantity bhi. Jo ek cheez, ek cheez yeh hai ki quantity ka issue toh hai hi ma'am. Uska mai nahi bol raha hu ki haa aap jaise hi hai toh aapka software me jo generate hota hai, uske hisab se hame sahi lagta hai, hum hi wohi utha de. Hum kaafi saari cheez dekh ke koi inquiry buyleads karte hai. Matlab ki uska GST number hai, woh business related hai, kitne saal se aapke yaha register hai. Hmm, uska kya related inquiry hai. Usne search kiya hai kuch aur cheez, uska kaam hai kuch aur cheez ka. Toh woh humse related nahi hai. Woh sab saari cheeze dekh ke usko baad me hum usko fetch karte hai, buyleads karte hai ma'am. Lekin jo direct inquiry ki baat kar rahe hai na, jo call aa raha hai na, yeh yaha ka local banda koi call kar raha hai teen din se. Woh mujhe bolta hai ki mujhe yeh yeh cheez chahiye. Liquid form chahiye. Hamara liquid ka halaki kaam hi nahi hai ma'am. Toh uska inquiry aap direct bol denge ki inquiry aapke paas aaya hai toh mere ka koi kaam ki nahi raha hai toh mai usko kya leke pakdunga mai? Bataiye. Khaamkha mera waqt barbaad hota hai. Aur uska quantity kya rehta hai? Mai aapko chahe toh aap recording karke mai usko uska bhi bhejunga aapko ki aap dekh lijiye ki uska inquiry kya tha. Haa direct woh jo call karta hai na, bolta hai mujhe ek piece chahiye hamare try karne ke liye hamare khet me. Ek ek piece chahiye. Ek piece matlab ki kya ho gaya? Woh cheez hi nahi hum bech rahe hai ma'am. Ek piece ka. Sir, ek minute.

Customer: Query on hai. Mai aapko clearly batau. Aapki service ka humne promotion pura aapke mark kar diye. Jitne product add hai, mere hisab se woh bhi humne kar diye. Proper categorization karawa. Display pe jaha aapki site dikhegi, usi position pe sab kuch hoga. Uske accordingly aapke paas buyer ki calls aayengi. Aur retail aur bulk har cheez ke liye. Abhi hum isme direct call increase karne ke liye mere paas ek hi provision tha ki mai number of products increase kar pau. Shayad call increase ho paye. Baki sir aur koi option nahi hai. Dusra tarika toh yeh hai. Ha, maine pehle Vivek ji se woh Aditya ji se baat hua tha mera. First time ki baat kar raha hu. Tab usne bola tha ki aapka GST me trader dikh raha hua hai. Barabar hai? Toh maine usko hata ke hamara GST me bhi maine update karwaya aur aapko diya. Uske baad me hamara manufacturing dikh raha hai. Toh yeh manufacturing dikhne lag gaya, woh bhi sahi baat hai. Woh sab mere se jitna bhi ho sakta hai, woh bhi mai bhi support karta hu. Aur woh bhi support kar rahe the. Lekin system me kahi na kahi chuk jaate hai. Shayad aap chuk jaata hoga, shayad mere se chuk jaata hoga. Lekin usme mai kya best kar saku na, woh mujhe bataiye. Uska problem ka solution. Sir, mai aapko wohi bata rahi hu. Mai bata rahi hu. Dekhiye mai aapko yeh commitment nahi dungi sir kyuki mai direct nahi badha dungi. Mai sirf aapko tarika bata sakti hu, shayad usse ek ya do inquiry aapki badh jaye. Aap aap buyer ko jo call karte hai na sir, woh aap try kariye ki aap lead manager se call kare. Hamesha agar aap nahi kar pa rahe hai, toh sir maine scanner ka matlab aapko amount aayega, click kar diya hai. Aap waha se bhi connect kar sakte hai sir. Aapko lag raha hai, woh kyu nahi kar raha? Nahi aapka aawaz madam slowly aa raha hai aur bagal se jyada. Abhi aa rahi hai sir aapko aawaz? Abhi aa rahi hai aapko aawaz?

Executive: Ji.

Executive: Ha sir, mai aap scanner ki baat kar rahe hai, kaha ke scanner ki baat kar rahe hai ma'am? Sir, inquiry me ek scanner aap aap kaam kaise karte hai? App se karte hai ya desktop se jyada karte hai? Kis me comfortable hote hai?

Executive: Mai desktop me hi rehta hu ma'am. Subah se desktop pe hi kaam karta hu. Lead manager me kisi bhi lead ko open kariye sir. Ji. Koi bhi ek lead open kariye. Ji. Right me dekhiye jaha buyer ki contact details aati hai na right me, waha pe ek scanner bhi aata hai sir. Ek green color ka icon aa raha hoga call call icon. Ji ma'am. Uspe agar cursor rakhenge aap, toh ek scanner ya click to pe aisa option aayega. Ji ma'am. Click to call sorry. Toh aap jo buyer ko call karte hai, toh aap yaha se kariye. Ek toh hamara AI is cheez ko capture karega, tab hum aapko thodi preference de paye. Ji ma'am. Thik hai? Toh aapko koshish karni hai ki aap generally calls IndiaMART ke through kare. Aur aapke paas jitni bhi leads aati hai, aap sab pe reply karte hai. Toh aap lead manager se teen reply jarur bhejiye har buyer ko. Teen reply. Teen reply me sir dekhiye aapne quantity puch li. Mai samajh gaya. Thanks for the inquiry, matlab kuch bhi puch liya, teen reply. Teen unique reply aapke jaane chahiye. Ek tarika yeh hai jo aapki taraf se ho sakta hai jisse thoda bahut improvement ho sakta hai. But baki mai yeh bolu sir ki koi option hai ki hum aapki inquiries ko jyada badha sake direct. Toh abhi aur kuch nahi. Madam madam yeh mai bol raha hu, mujhe inquiry jyada nahi chahiye. Mai kya bol raha hu, mujhe actual me chahiye kya? Mujhe actual me dhandha chahiye ma'am. Business chahiye, barabar hai? Business wahi se aayega jo mera related rahega. Maan lijiye aaj inquiry aaya hai Nisarg Agro Center karke. Usko maine aaj subah me call kiya toh woh bol raha hai ki mujhe 10 kg chahiye. 10 kg matlab ki ek baalti hua aur hum 1000 baalti se kam nahi dete kisi ko. Ab maan lijiye hum Gujarat me baithe hai. Nahi nahi mai aapko sirf samjha raha hu, mujhe aur kuch nahi chahiye. Mai yeh bol raha hu ki yeh Karnataka ka hai ma'am aur usko ek baalti hi chahiye. Woh bole ki hum check karenge pehle, aane ke baad me 100 baalti le sakte hai. Maan lijiye koi 500 bhi bolta hai na toh 500 me usko hum 1000 tak usko convince kar sakte hai. Lekin ek ko hum 1000 me kaha se convince kar payenge? Woh Karnataka ka hai. Mai aapki baat samajh rahi hu lekin is cheez me hum kuch nahi kar payenge sir. Jo possibility hai, jaha ka jo option dikha woh maine aapko bhejha. Maine mail se bhi bhejha aur jo aapki site pe ho sakta tha lead manager aur calls ka replies ka woh maine aapko bataya. Baki mai bolungi sir koi bhi tarika hai, yeh koi scope hai ya humne kuch suppress kar rakha hai, aisa kuch bhi nahi. Surprise toh mai kisi ka fault nahi nikalta hu. Mai system ka fault nikalta hu. Lekin halaki samna aapka aur hamara hota hai. Barabar hai? System toh system hi hai. Woh sab humne banaya hua hai. Woh sab hamare aur se hi kaam kar rahe hai. Matlab ki humne jaise banaya hai aise. Lekin usme kahi chuk jaate hai, kahi misunderstanding kisi se reh jaati hai toh woh hame bataiye ki hum usme kaha se best kar paate hai aur hamara business nikal jaye waha. Mai yeh bol raha hu mai aapko. Sir jo cheez possible hai na maine aapko woh bata di. Isse jyada aur kuch nahi ho payega sir. No problem ma'am. Koi baat nahi hum try karte hai. Uska bhi mai woh karta hu. Aap jo bol rahe hai na teen reply ko kijiyega ya IndiaMART through call kar lijiyega. Woh bhi sahi kar denge. Lekin usme inquiry thoda sahi value ka aaye. Toh iska kya solution nikal sakte hai? Filter wagera me kya hai?

Customer: Sir dekhiye aapki profile hum buyer ko display kar rahe hai. Ab woh woh profile bulk aur retail dono buyer ke liye hai. Ab yeh buyer pe depend karta hai sir buyer kis requirement ke liye aapko call karta hai. Isme kya koi hame content nahi send karna hai na matlab ki yeh jo abhi ek. Sir isme ab koi filtration nahi hai ki hum kisi ke saath kisi tarah ka specific buyer bhej paate hai. Ma'am hamara text ki baat kar raha hu. Matlab ki aap jo hamara photos wagera ya products aap jo kisi ko display kar rahe hai, promotion kar rahe hai. Barabar hai? Toh usme kuch changes karne ki koi requirement hai kya? Kya isme yeh word use chahiye ya matlab usko kya bolte hai? Keyword bolte hai na aap? Keywords kya use karna hai kya nahi karna hai? Sir keywords maine aapko mail kara tha kuch keywords find out karke ki agar inme se koi keyword aapke liye relevant hai aur aapko lagta hai ki add ho sakta hai toh yeh hum add kara sakte hai kuch naye extra keywords hai. Yeh IndiaMART ki categories hai. Toh maine identify karke aapko bheji thi. Agar aapko comfortable lagta hai toh usme se selectively bata dijiye, kaunsi aapko category add karani hai, hum woh bhi add kar denge. Thik hai mai dekh leta hu. Isko maine itna isme kiya tha, thoda gussa bhi tha mai aur aapke aap thoda mujhe yeh samjhane ki koshish kar rahe the ki naya premium lijiye aur humse solve nahi ho payega. Isliye thoda mai gusse me aa gaya tha kyuki yeh hamara problem solution karne ki wajah se aap naya mode lene ki baat kar rahe the. Isliye thoda hum frustrated the isliye aapka pura mail maine nahi dekha hai. Ab mai pura mail dekh leta hu ek baar aur dekhta hu isme kya best ho sakta hai. Barabar hai na? Thik hai. Aur ek category hai sir green manure. Iske andar leads purchase kar rahi hai but yeh as a category add nahi hai. Toh isme mai abhi add kara du agar aap deal kar rahe hai toh? Green manure. Green manure. Haa kar dijiye isme koi dikkat nahi hai. Thik hai toh mai isse add kara rahi hu. Baki aap mujhe list me se reply kar dijiyega ki aap kitna deal karte hai woh hum add kara denge. Aur baki promotion me jo categorization me ho sakta tha woh maine utni der me aapke hisab se kara diya tha. Aur aapko jo callback aur replies ka hai woh maine aapko bataya ki aap kaise increase kar sakte hai. Reply aap karte hai, calls shayad aap nahi karte hai kyuki aapko idea nahi hoga ki aap yaha se bhi kar sakte hai. Nahi reply toh hum definitely karte hai. Kisi ko nahi chhodte hai lekin single reply hamara jaata hai. Ki aapko actual me chahiye kya ya product related hai ya usne us kam detail dali hai toh show or more details karke usko bhejte hai. Teen reply matlab minimum teen karna hai woh hum kar denge sir isme. Thumb sab ka icon aata hai agar lead kaam ki hoti hai toh usko thumb sab pe bhi click kara denge. No problem ma'am. Haa yeh saari cheeze aap kariye. Baki categories aap dekh kar mujhe bata dijiyega. Green manure mai aapka yeh add kara rahe hai. Ji ha. Thik hai. Aur baki mai sir abhi aur toh hum isse jyada nahi kar payenge. Toh mai iska concern bhi close kar deti hu. Koi baat nahi. Thank you. Thank you sir. Welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Wants to know the reason for not getting business.

- Wants resolution for the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process of lead generation.

- Executive suggested using lead manager to call buyers.

- Executive offered to add the 'Green Manure' category.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will add the 'Green Manure' category.

- Customer will check the mail and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, resolution, category
